briefdescription.para: Convenience macro, for usage in test functions:
As above, but allows printing a message:

memberdef.name: TESTEQUALS

briefdescription.para: Asserts that the left expression equals the right expression, and that no exception is thrown.

memberdef.name: TESTEQUALS_FLOAT

briefdescription.para: Asserts that the left expression equals the right expression, within a margin of error epsilon, and that no exception is thrown.

memberdef.name: TESTTHROWS

briefdescription.para: Asserts that the expression throws an exception.

memberdef.name: TESTNOEXCEPT

briefdescription.para: Assets that the expression throws no exception (mostly for void expressions).
